00080 # MicropolisNoticeView
00081 
00082 
00083 class MicropolisNoticeView(micropolisview.MicropolisView):
00084 
00085 
00086     viewWidth = 150
00087     viewHeight = 150
00088 
00089 
00090     def __init__(
00091         self,
00092         setMapViewVisible=None,
00093         **args):
00094 
00095         micropolisview.MicropolisView.__init__(
00096             self,
00097             aspect='notice',
00098             interests=('city', 'notice', 'message',),
00099             **args)
00100 
00101         self.zoomable = False
00102         self.setMapViewVisible = setMapViewVisible
00103         self.messageNumber = 0
00104         self.message = ''
00105         self.messageX = -1
00106         self.messageY = -1
00107         self.description = ''
00108         self.showPicture = False
00109         self.important = False
00110         self.sprite = micropolisengine.SPRITE_NOTUSED
00111 
00112         self.set_size_request(self.viewWidth, self.viewHeight)
00113 
00114 
00115     def update(self, name, *args):
00116 
00117         if name == 'message':
00118             self.updateMessage(*args)
00119 
00120 
00121     def updateMessage(
00122         self,
00123         messageNumber,
00124         messageX,
00125         messageY,
00126         showPicture,
00127         important):
00128 
00129         engine = self.engine
00130         notices = engine.notices
00131 
00132         notice = notices.get(messageNumber, None)
00133         if not notice:
00134             return
00135 
00136         sprite = notice.get('sprite', micropolisengine.SPRITE_NOTUSED)
00137 
00138         self.messageNumber = messageNumber
00139         self.message = notice['title']
00140         self.messageX = messageX
00141         self.messageY = messageY
00142         self.description = notice['description']
00143         self.showPicture = showPicture
00144         self.important = important
00145         self.sprite = sprite
00146 
00147         setMapViewVisible = self.setMapViewVisible
00148         if setMapViewVisible:
00149             setMapViewVisible(showPicture, messageX, messageY, sprite)
00150 
00151         self.queue_draw()
00152 
00153 
00154     def drawContent(
00155         self,
00156         ctx,
00157         playout):
00158 
00159         #print "==== MicropolisNoticeView DRAWCONTENT", self
00160 
00161         engine = self.engine
00162 
00163         winRect = self.get_allocation()
00164         winWidth = winRect.width
00165         winHeight = winRect.height
00166 
00167         ctx.save()
00168 
00169         ctx.set_source_rgb(1.0, 1.0, 1.0)
00170         ctx.rectangle(0, 0, winWidth, winHeight)
00171         ctx.fill()
00172 
00173         gap = 10
00174         textX = gap
00175         textY = gap
00176         textWidth = winWidth - (2 * gap)
00177         textHeight = winHeight - (2 * gap)
00178 
00179         if (textWidth > 0) and (textHeight > 0):
00180 
00181             messageNumber = self.messageNumber
00182             if messageNumber:
00183                 message = engine.messages[messageNumber]
00184             else:
00185                 message = ""
00186 
00187             text = self.description
00188 
00189             markup1 = """<span>
00190 <b>%s</b>
00191 
00192 %s
00193 </span>
00194 """ % (
00195                 message,
00196                 text,
00197             )
00198 
00199             ctx.set_source_rgb(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00200             playout.set_font_description(self.labelFont)
00201             playout.set_width(textWidth * 1024)
00202             #playout.set_height(textHeight)
00203 
00204             #print markup1
00205             playout.set_markup(markup1)
00206             ctx.move_to(10, 10)
00207             ctx.show_layout(playout)
00208
